newsitem.title: UK: Inchcape buys S. Africa ship agency Voigt.
newsitem.headline: Inchcape buys S. Africa ship agency Voigt.

text.p: British conglomerate Inchcape Plc said on Wednesday its shipping services unit bought South Africa's Voigt Shipping (Pty) Ltd for a "nominal" amount.
Voigt, a specialist in key bulk commodities, had turnover of 1.0 million stg and net assets of 50,000 stg, Inchcape said in a statement. -- London Newsroom +44 171 542 7717
